alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Madison River Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 8:18AM MST until February 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...The Madison and Beaverhead River Valleys. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Persons should consider delaying all travel. Motorists should use extreme caution if travel is absolutely necessary. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Madison River Valley
